name: MetaDrace
description: MetaDrace is a blockchain-based NFT gift for speed sports and enthusiasts fans, dog lovers, and the E-sports community. In MetaDrace you will own powerful virtual Greyhound dogs. You will nurture and train them in your own way to victory in the fiercest tournaments. Or you only need to predict which dogs will win the race and collect your reward. With the training room system, no other dog will have the same strength as the other on the MetaDrace World.
